name: txt_gud
desc:
GUD: Causes the unit to be awesome!
Anti: The unit becomes awful.

name: txt_awdul
desc:
AWDUL: Causes the unit to be awful.
Anti: The unit becomes awesome!

name: txt_happen
desc: HAPPEN: Where any other unit would normally transform into this one, they instead RP it. In theory. It's not done yet.

name: txt_nft
desc:
NFT: Nothing can become this unit.
Anti: moar

name: txt_limeme
desc:
limeme: Causes the unit to appear lime.
Grun+Yello.
Anti: coral

name: txt_corl
desc:
CORL: Causes the unit to appear magenta.
Pinc+Whit.
Anti: limeme

name: txt_thing
desc: THING: Includes all units that are not convertible.

name: letter__
desc: I wonder if bab be u will even properly parse this lether?

name: txt_matic
desc:
MATIC: Moves forwards. Cannot be cancelled via SLEP.
ANTI: Starts going in circles

name: txt_vsl
desc: VSL: Controlled by player input, but does not respond to :( objects. Not flippin' implemented yet

name: txt_yesgo
desc: YESGO: Will not be impeded by NOGO, GOAWAYPLS, or other similar properties. ANTI: Will not move onto a tile that has any other object

name: txt_splash
desc: SPLASH: If its movement is cancelled, it will instantly melt. ANTI: Treat others as SPLASH

name: txt_did
desc:
DID: A prefix the object is more YEE than it is ANTI YEE.
ANTI: Swap YEE and anti YEE

name: txt_yee
desc:
YEE: Causes the DID prefix to activate. Stacks.
ANTI: -1 to count
